#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main () {
	int tc;
	cin >> tc;
	while (tc--) {
		string s1; string s2;
		cin >> s1;
		cin >> s2;
		if (s1.size()!=s2.size()) {
			cout << "-1" << endl;
			continue;
		}
		long long count = 0;
		for (int i=0; i<s1.size(); i++) {
			if (s1[i]!=s2[i])
				count++;
		}
		cout << count << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
